summary: Port of one of the best dress from hentai, still learning about this so dont expect much :P
descriptionHtml:
One of two or three ports that i made and im gonna share with you guys, im pretty much done with the weights stuff, if any can and want fix the skirt(i try but it was too much for me :( ) i would be very happy xD.

This is not a direct port, i have to move/push a lot of vertex >_<, so be kind with me.

The Hana dress can be found in the leather cratf column
The boots in the elven and the gloves in the misc section, sorry for that is just that skyedit hate me.

PS Gonna try to update this when i can fix all the mess.



Permission notes:

You can fix my mess, you only need to ask first to the original authors, oh yea and give me credit too. ^^
But you cant upload it to steam, no matter what, thats not allowed

Credits:

zotman12 aka Hentai for the amazing dress
To the tnt members for the hera and athena body used to do this.
